EmailTemplate.name: Tell Us How We're Doing - SCR
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell Us How We're Doing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tell us how we're doing...
As a valued Univar customer, we’d like your opinion. You’re invited to take part in a Customer Survey to tell us how well Univar is serving you—where we’re successful, and where we need improvement.
Please take our quick, less than 5 minute survey. You may choose to enter a random drawing at the end of the survey to be one of three winners of a $100 Amazon gift card. Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we rate.
If you experience problems with the above link, please email us at: CustomerCare@univarusa.com
Contact Us Univar USA Online Ordering 3
